review: I recently purchased the Monoprice Electric Guitar Wall Mount and I'm very pleased with it. The mount is well-made, easy to install, and securely holds my guitar without any issues. The rubber-covered braces are a great touch, ensuring that my guitar's finish is protected. The adjustable body brace allows for a perfect fit, and the price is very reasonable for the quality and functionality. It's a must-have for any guitarist looking to display their instrument.
